## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Virtual screening of the SARS-CoV-2 main protease with rxDock and pose scoring](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/computational-chemistry/tutorials/covid19-docking/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
